bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: packing all objects into the bin
goals.2: If there is a black object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: never attempt to pick up and set down an object named box
rules.2: when place a 1D object in the bin, the soft object must be in the bin before
rules.3: if there is an elastic object, push the object not in the bin, but on the platform
